name: The Hunter's Blade
description:
The Hunter's Blade is a game about hunting beats and collecting their trophies. You play as somebody from a group called The Hunters that hunt monsters for sport. Use powerful abilities and spells to take down your foes and gather an unrivalled collection of trophies. What is currently available is a proof of concept or a demo. I might expand on it if anybody cares.

Thanks for Downloading!
